rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 10 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 6:08 AM, 23 June 2025(Monday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Cavite, Pampanga, Bulacan, Batangas and Laguna within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Zambales(San Narciso, Castillejos, Subic, San Marcelino, San Antonio, Olongapo), Bataan(Morong, Orani, Samal, Abucay, Limay, Mariveles, Bagac, Orion) and Quezon(Pagbilao, Patnanungan, Padre Burgos, Unisan, Agdangan, Atimonan) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
